sentences.en: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
sentences.cn: 警方昨天的调查为其开脱了在这件事故中所有的责任。

sentences.en: Absolve you and you shall have the suffrage of the world.
sentences.cn: 终于你的内心,你将会得到世界的认可.

sentences.en: Absolve you to yourself, and you shall have the suffrage of the world.
sentences.cn: 解脱自己, 就会得到世人的认可.

sentences.en: I absolve you, on the ground of invincible ignorance.
sentences.cn: 鉴于你不可救药的无知,我原谅你.

sentences.en: I shall absolve you and continue along the path of righteousness.
sentences.cn: 我就宽恕你们,大家各走各的路.

sentences.en: My good cousin, absolve yourself from sorrow.
sentences.cn: 我的好姐姐, 别自寻烦恼吧.

sentences.en: My good cousin, absolve yourself from that!
sentences.cn: 我的好姐姐, 别自寻苦恼吧.

sentences.en: No one can absolve him from his sins, for his forbidden love and strong.
sentences.cn: 这份禁断之爱坚如磐石,没人能赦免他的罪.

sentences.en: Waiting is giving you a reluctant reason; Live up is giving yourself an answer to absolve!
sentences.cn: 等待是给自己勉强的理由; 实践是给自己答案的解脱!

sentences.en: Why you send to absolve me from my promise, when'you wished I wouldn't keep it?
sentences.cn: 你既然愿意我不守诺言, 为什么不派人送信叫我免了算啦?

trans.tran_en: to say publicly that someone is not guilty or responsible for something

trans.tran_cn: 宣告…无罪，赦免…的罪行，宽恕…的罪行，不受责难，免除责任 [义务] ,开脱（罪责）
trans.tran_en: to say publicly that someone is not guilty or responsible for something
